gw.datatype.handler

Interface INumberConstraintsHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataTypeConstraintsHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDecimalConstraintsHandler, IIntegerConstraintsHandler, ILongConstraintsHandler, IMoneyConstraintsHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyAmountConstraintsHandlerBase, DecimalConstraintsHandler, DecimalConstraintsHandlerBase, IntegerConstraintsHandler, IntegerConstraintsHandlerBase, LongConstraintsHandlerBase

    public interface INumberConstraintsHandler
extends IDataTypeConstraintsHandler
    Subclass of constraints handler for numeric values.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Range<? extends java.lang.Number> getRange(java.lang.Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the valid value range for this datatype.

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.datatype.handler.IDataTypeConstraintsHandler

        getConsistencyCheckerPredicates, getLoaderValidationPredicates, validateUserInput, validateValue

    • Method Detail

      • getRange

        Range<? extends java.lang.Number> getRange(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                           IPropertyInfo property)
        Gets the valid value range for this datatype.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the object that owns the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
        property - the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
        Returns:
        the maximum value, or null if this datatype has no maximum.
